question: Where and when was Einstein born?
contexts: Albert Einstein (born 14 March 1879) was a German-born theoretical physicist
widely held to be one of the greatest and most influential scientists of all time
answer: Einstein was born in Germany on 14th March 1879.
ground_truth: Einstein was born in Germany on 14th March 1879.
